titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1951-06-23 - Minnie Pearl performance - WSM

mods.abstract: Excerpts from a Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 23, 1951. Featuring Red Foley (announcer), Minnie Pearl and Rod Brasfield on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
